00046 void TableMutatorDispatchHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00047   int32_t error;
00048 
00049   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00050     error = Protocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00051     if (error != Error::OK) {
00052       m_send_buffer->add_errors_all(error);
00053     }
00054     else {
00055       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00056       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00057       uint32_t offset, len;
00058 
00059       if (remaining == 0) {
00060         m_send_buffer->clear();
00061       }
00062       else {
00063         while (remaining) {
00064           try {
00065             error = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00066             offset = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00067             len = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00068           }
00069           catch (Exception &e) {
00070             HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00071             break;
00072           }
00073           if (error == Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE)
00074             m_send_buffer->add_retries(offset, len);
00075           else
00076             m_send_buffer->add_errors(error, offset, len);
00077         }
00078       }
00079     }
00080   }
00081   else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00082     m_send_buffer->add_retries_all();
00083     HT_WARNF("%s, will retry ...", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00084   }
00085   else {
00086     // this should never happen
00087     HT_ERRORF("%s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00088   }
00089 
00090   m_send_buffer->counterp->decrement();
00091 }
